fullText: This high-energy musical about the six wives of Henry VIII is a sugar rush of pop anthems that transforms historical figures into contemporary divas.
dtliExcerpt: This high-energy musical about the six wives of Henry VIII is a sugar rush of pop anthems that transforms historical figures into contemporary divas.
